prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Bass, Strings, Drums, Synth Lead, Guitar, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Bass, Strings, Drums, Synth Lead, and Guitar, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Bass, Strings, Drums, Synth Lead, and Guitar, omitting the Organ.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Piano, Bass, Strings, Drums, Synth Lead, and Guitar, excluding the Organ.
